column1: Master of Science/Postgraduate Diploma in Environmental Engineering and Management
column2: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
column3: School of Engineering - Taught Postgraduate Programs
column5: The program is meant to meet the needs of practicing engineers who may be engaged in the design, commissioning and management of environmental facilities and infrastructure systems. The program is designed for those who wish to strengthen their environmental engineering knowledge and management skills, as well as to prepare themselves for advanced engineering practices with management responsibilities. The programs also enable students to take several electives from other related programs.
